effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.2 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 583,617.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Increases effectiveness of Blasphemite secondary effects by 25%.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Zap yourself for 299,118 Nature damage, gaining 19,664 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
T'uure, Beacon of the Naaru

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Stormwind.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
